original_title: More than 18,000 visitors view Lotus Tower
original_body_lines: A total of 18,728 foreigners visited the Lotus Tower during the past long weekend, its management said.
They said the calculation was made considering the visitor count for July 01, 02, and 03 from all over the country.
Meanwhile, the Lotus Tower Management said there were 367 foreign visitors to the Lotus Tower.
Since the tower was opened to the public on Sepermber 15, 2022 todate a total to 953,918 people have visited the tower and 18,320 foreigners have been among them. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
